title: Peter Schiff Warns of Banks’ Escalating Real Estate Exposure, Surpassing 2007 Levels
description: Peter Schiff, CEO of Euro Pacific Capital, recently raised alarm bells about the increasing dangers banks are encountering due to their amplified exposure to the real estate market. Schiff also holds multiple positions in different financial services firms, such as Euro Pacific Asset Management, an autonomous investment advisory firm; Schiff Gold, previously known as Euro […]

title: DLSS 3 from NVIDIA: Can it Run on Older GPUs?
description: Explore DLSS 3 Compatibility on GeForce RTX 20 and 30-Series GPUs, Stuttering Issues Revealed, NVIDIA's Strategy Questioned. What Lies Ahead for DLSS 3 Support on Older Hardware?

title: Can AI Therapy Truly Address the Global Mental Health Crisis?
description: In the face of an escalating mental health crisis, many nations are considering alternative solutions to the conventional therapist-patient model. One such solution that has gained considerable traction is using AI-driven chatbots for therapy. However, recent incidents have raised questions about the safety and efficacy of these digital therapists. The controversy surrounding “Tessa” Earlier this ... Read more

title: Consensys takes a bold step into Web3 development with SMG acquisition
description: Consensys, a frontrunner in blockchain technology and applications, has recently announced the acquisition of Special Mechanism Group (SMG), a company highly recognized for its blockchain microstructure research and mechanism design. This notable merger manifests as a pivotal point in Consensys’s journey towards making Web3 accessible to all, underscoring its commitment to augmenting decentralized networks. The ... Read more

title: Elon Musk To Go Public with Twitter (X) in New Cooperation – Can it Push Dogecoin (DOGE) Price to $0,08?
description: Supporters of the popular Doge memecoin are optimistic about the near future as they look forward to a much-needed price pump. title: Flare Network to Burn a Total of 2.1 Billion FLR Tokens That Were Allocated to Early Investors to Support Ecosystem Health
description: The tranche of tokens to be burned had been allocated to Flare’s early backers and includes 198,880,170.19 FLR that will be burned next month, with a further 66,293,390.06 units set to be burned monthly until January 2026. The number of Flare (FLR) tokens scheduled to be burned accounts for almost 40 percent of the original [...]

title: New sFRAX Vault Locks $35 Million Worth Of Deposits In 24 Hours
description:
On October 12, Crypto Hedge Fund Ouroboros Capital announced that the decentralized cross-chain protocol, Frax Finance introduced sFRAX, an ERC4626 staking vault, enabling FRAX holders to earn yields equivalent to the interest rate on reserve balances set by the U.S. Federal Reserve (IORB). However, the influx of investor funds into its newly introduced high-yield staking […]

The post New sFRAX Vault Locks $35 Million Worth Of Deposits In 24 Hours appeared first on Coin Edition.
